title: (x) "Perros No" sign, just a nad away from Helvetica - Folio Cd {Marc O}
content:
Hi there,

Can I get some help with this one, please? I thought it was a squooshed Helvetica Black Condensed, but it doesn't quite match up. The counter in that P in particular. Is it possibly some Hyper Condensed version of Helvetica I don't have?

Cheers,  
/stephen

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017050353im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Perros-No_3429.jpg)
author: Stephen Lording

comments.content: There are cuts called Compressed, Ultra compressed and Inserat.
Helvetica Compressed, Extra Compressed, Ultra Compressed are different.
Spot on. Folio Bold Condensed it is! Thanks a lot, Marc.
